10 Facts About Meteora

Elisheva

10 Facts About Meteora

Elisheva

|

12 February 2019

↟↟↟

Share

Meteora is located in Thessaly (Thessalía), Greece. The monasteries are located not far from the small town of Kalambáka, and the village of Kastraki. Meteora is located in Thessaly (Thessalía), Greece. The monasteries are located not far from the small town of Kalambáka, and the village of Kastraki.
Meteora, Greece
